Description

Plain rectangular bronze plaque with the inscription in relief

Inscription

IN MEMORY OF/ THEODORE BAYLEY HARDY,/ VICAR OF HUTTON ROOF 1913-1918./ APPOINTED C.F. AUG. 1916: ATTACHED 8TH LINCS./ REGT & 8TH SOMERSET LT. INFANTRY. AWARDED D.S.O./ JULY 1917: M.C. OCT, 1917: VICTORIA CROSS APRIL/ 1918, CHAPLAIN TO THE KING SEPT. 1918. WAS/ WOUNDED OCT. 1918. DIED ROUEN OCT 18, 1918./ THIS TABLET IS ERECTED AS PART OF A DIOCESAN TRIBUTE TO/ HIS HEROIC COURAGE, SYMPATHETIC SERVICE AND SPIRITUAL/ LABOURS.

Inscription legible?

yes
